title: Rellekka Longhall Bar

properties.value: The Rellekka Longhall Bar is a bar found in the Rellekka longhall. It sells two kinds of beer and kegs of beer. Some NPCs located in the bar are the focus of the quest The Fremennik Trials, in which the player must enlist the support of Manni the Reveller and begin the quest by talking to Brundt the Chieftain.

Rellekka Longhall Bar
Released2 November 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationRellekka
OwnerThora the Barkeep
SpecialtyPub
Location

The Rellekka Longhall Bar is a bar found in the Rellekka longhall. It sells two kinds of beer and kegs of beer. Some NPCs located in the bar are the focus of the quest The Fremennik Trials, in which the player must enlist the support of Manni the Reveller and begin the quest by talking to Brundt the Chieftain.

The stage of this bar is used by players during The Fremennik Trials, where they play an instrument for progression of the quest.

Thora the Barkeep also resides in the bar, and sells two kinds of beer (one in a glass, one in a tankard) and a keg of beer.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text of the spit roast at the centre of the long hall (Finger licking good!) is a reference to KFC's slogan' "They're finger lickin' good!".
